high_descs: Turn around and walk to the wall, then turn right to face the bunk beds.
Pick the basketball up from the floor.
Turn right and walk to the end of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a basketball in the light.

high_descs: Turn around and walk past the desk to the end of the bed
Pick up the basketball from the ground
Turn and walk over to the left side of the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the basketball under the light of the lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the basketball on the floor by the bed.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Turn right and walk to the front of the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: turn right to face desk, turn right to face wall, turn right to face bed, look down
pick up the basketball that is on the floor
turn right, walk forward, turn right after the desk, walk forward, hold ball up to lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a basketball with a lamp
